Html: I'm not sure if I don't understand how intel works now, but does 10 intel not equal 1 spell damage? When optimizing gear for DPS I am coming up with intel gems being socketed instead of plus damage gems?  Any info would be appreciated :)
Most likely you forgot to enable Replenishment/JoW.
? I'm not fully understanding ... I did enable JoW and now it does say to socket with spell damage gems.  Why the change after enabling JoW?
You were running out of mana.
Is there anyway to see an optimized action sequence?  It sure would help a user to identify issues such as this.
You can see this information if you mouse over the * next to Spell Cycles in the Solution section of Stats tab. If it includes wanding that is a good suggestion that you're running out of mana.
